mapper.select: select p.pid, p.bname, p.pname, p.pprice, c.ccolorcode, c.cimage1, mc.ssize, mc.qty from product.product p join product.color c on p.pid = c.pid join member.cart mc on p.pid = mc.pid and c.ccolorcode = mc.ccolorcode where memail = #{memail}
mapper.insert: insert into cart(memail, pid, ccolorcode, ssize, qty) values(#{memail}, #{param2.pid}, #{param2.ccolorcode}, #{param2.ssize}, #{param2.qty})
mapper.delete: delete cart where memail=#{memail} and pid = #{param2.pid} and ssize = #{param2.ssize} and ccolorcode = #{param2.ccolorcode}
mapper.update: update cart set ccolorcode=#{newcolorcode}, ssize=#{newsize}, qty=#{newqty} where memail=#{memail} and pid=#{pid} and ccolorcode=#{ccolorcode} and ssize=#{ssize};
